sentence: move the left red block in front of the leftmost purple block
straighten and move the purple block at the center to the back of the purple block behind the red block
stack the left purple block which is behind the left red block above the left red block
move the front yellow block to the back of the red block that was moved initially
move the metal purple block on the center right to the right of the red block that was moved initially
move the red block that you have not touched yet to the right side of the block you just moved
